sections.content:
func (s Set) String() string {
	switch s {
	case SetInit:
		return "SetInit"
	case SetLegacyGlobal:
		return "SetLegacyGlobal"
	case SetNodeAnn:
		return "SetNodeAnn"
	case SetInvoice:
		return "SetInvoice"
	case SetInvoiceAmp:
		return "SetInvoiceAmp"
	default:
		return "SetUnknown"
	}
}
